title: (x) Heartland - Gillies Gothic {Mark S, Mike Y}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142513im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25252.gif)   
   
Yet another font which has been said to be Kaufmann. And which as well (and this one even more obviously than yesterday's Gillies Gothic) doesn't at all seem to be... So, if anyone can help on rightly identifying it, I would be greatly appreciated, thank you.
author: ssmm

comments.content: It looks like Gillies Gothic Light

Oh geez! But of course! How could I have not tried it!!!?? (That "l" was just slapping on my face and I just didn't see it!!...) How blind (read "stupid") can one be!!... \*shakes head\* :-P (SORRY for my "stupidness" and for it making unnecessarily! 1000xSORRY!!!)
Sorry for posting twice, but, somehow the first post got the last line cut off in some words... :/ (Today is not my day, I reckon...)
Hey, no problem. It's not necessarilly obvious when you're not familar with a font.
